text: Hi, When we talk about brokerage platforms in India, Groww is one of the top names and is often considered among the No.1 brokers. However, there is one serious issue that I have been noticing for a long time. Whenever we do options buying, the app often lags or hangs, especially during high volatility. text: 07/12/2025 I have been using this app for some time now. But when I started intraday trading, i encountered its high slippage. For example, I book a trade at a profit of around 12000 using their exit button, the executed amount would be 10000. There have been times when booked a profit of more than 2000 still the executed profit was not only less but in loss -749. This is higly disappointing. Now I'm looking for a new broker app. Too much Fraud app. I have lost 20000 rupees on this app. Hence

reason: The review describes a functional defect in the app's candle view on Android, where precise interaction with individual candles is not possible.
text: The app works like a charm. However, there is an issue due to which I am rating it 3/5. In candle view of graph, it is not possible to click on every candle to check open, close, high, low and volume in android. When I click to one candle and slid my finger it often jumps 2 or 3 candles. But it is quite possible to navigate through each and every candle in iPhone. I hope it gets fixed soon. I will update my review after this bug is fixed in android.

text: please add paper' account for practice trading.

reason: The review explicitly states the support team was unresponsive to app issues.
text: There were issues in the app which were causing loss in the trades. But the team was totally unresponsive towards it.
author: Karthikeyan P
title: Karthikeyan P

reason: The review details multiple functional defects like inability to see holdings, pathetic charts, and zoom issues.
text: taking so much charges in every trade...still so much glitches are there...sometimes you won't able to see your holding postions...charts are so much pathetic...you cannot able to zoom out the chart properly for analysing...please fix this all then take so much charges.. I will just use it for 2-3 months more if there is no changes or improvement I will shift to another app..if you can't improve your app, you should take low charges..
author: Sauptik Sinha Roy
title: Sauptik Sinha Roy

reason: The review explicitly complains about non-transparent and hidden charges deducted for orders.
text: Grow app is not transparently showing Charges deducted for buy and sell orders. Lot of hidden charges included. You cant easily find out the detail.One year, I am using this app. But I want to leave now.
author: Raja Sekhar
title: Raja Sekhar

reason: The review describes a functional defect where the automatic return showing feature has disappeared.
text: why you remove automatic return showing , from date I added stock till present it was showing returns bu suddenly it disappear why you remove it
author: Film Mahotsav
title: Film Mahotsav

reason: The review details multiple issues with the unresponsiveness and poor quality of customer support.
text: I am not sure why, but Groww‚Äôs customer support executives are extremely unresponsive. They appear to be in a hurry to close the chat and often end the conversation on their own without confirming whether the issue has been resolved. After the first query is submitted, there is no opportunity to ask follow-up questions or seek clarification on the solution they provide. Whether the response is understood or helpful seems irrelevant, as the chat is abruptly closed.
